alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 06 at 1:28PM PDT until May 08 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...White Pine County, Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....Blowing dust is expected along with the strong winds. Look for visibility to be greatly reduced at times, especially along the US-50 corridor. High profile vehicles should use extra caution along north-south routes.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; White Pine County
